name: Craft wooden door
goal: Craft a wooden door from planks using a crafting table
required_items: planks x6 (must be same wood type)
notes: Wooden doors block mobs from entering shelters (most mobs cannot open doors, except Vindicators on Hard difficulty and some older behavior). Doors are 2 blocks tall. The recipe yields 3 doors per craft. Unlike many recipes, ALL 6 planks MUST be the same wood type — you cannot mix oak and spruce planks. Each wood type produces its own visually distinct door: oak_door, spruce_door, birch_door, jungle_door, acacia_door, dark_oak_door, mangrove_door, cherry_door, pale_oak_door, bamboo_door, crimson_door, warped_door. Requires a crafting table.

steps.title: Obtain planks
steps.details: You need 6 planks of the SAME wood type. Craft from logs (2 logs = 8 planks, you need 6). Do NOT mix wood types — all 6 must match (e.g., all oak_planks or all spruce_planks).
checks: Have at least 6 planks of the same type in inventory

steps.title: Craft the wooden door
steps.details: Use a crafting table. Place 6 planks in two columns: left column (top-left, middle-left, bottom-left) and center column (top-center, middle-center, bottom-center). Yields 3 doors. Recipe: { "recipe": "oak_door", "count": 3 } (substitute the wood type as needed, e.g., spruce_door, birch_door, etc.).
checks: Door appears in inventory (3 per craft)
